'''Horn Hill''' is the seat of [[House Tarly]] in [[the Reach]]. It is located southeast of [[Highgarden]]. Its current Lord is [[Randyll Tarly]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Horn Hill lies a hundred leagues northeast of [[Oldtown]] among the thickly-wooded foothills of the [[Red Mountains]] of [[Dorne]]. There is a pond that lies below the castle.
